channel.title: Qubes - SSH (soon VNC) into Qubes dom0 - Testers Wanted!
channel.description:
Encrypted, authenticated SSH or VNC into Qubes dom0 over an authenticated Tor onion v3 service.
Only available in Qubes R4.1 and above.
User documentation: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Remote_Administration#Qubes_-_SSH_or_VNC_into_Qubes_dom0
Source code: https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-remote-support
Development notes: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Qubes_Remote_Support
Qubes ticket: https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/6364
Qubes repository upload status: https://github.com/QubesOS/updates-status/issues/2353
x2go (VNC) support broken until upstream fix for issue flows to Qubes R4.1 dom0: https://github.com/QubesOS/updates-status/issues/2353
Qubes mailing list discussion: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/qubes-users/176bd8b8-ade0-3a60-1b12-f168719293a1%40whonix.org
Credits: This has been a shared project among Qubes and Whonix project.
- conceptual planning: Patrick Schleizer, Whonix, Marek Marczykowski-G贸recki, Qubes OS, Insurgo - command line backend utilities, Whonix integration: Patrick Schleizer, Whonix - graphical user interface (GUI), Qubes Remote Support GUI: Marta Marczykowska-G贸recka (Qubes OS)
Gratitude is expressed to NLnet for funding this functionality as part of accessible security project!

item.title: Qubes - SSH (soon VNC) into Qubes dom0 - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Encrypted, authenticated SSH or VNC into Qubes dom0 over an authenticated Tor onion v3 service.

Only available in Qubes R4.1 and above.

User documentation:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Remote_Administration#Qubes_-_SSH_or_VNC_into_Qubes_dom0

Source code:
https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-remote-support

Development notes:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Qubes_Remote_Support

Qubes ticket:
https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/6364

Qubes repository upload status:
https://github.com/QubesOS/updates-status/issues/2353

x2go (VNC) support broken until upstream fix for issue flows to Qubes R4.1 dom0:
https://github.com/QubesOS/updates-status/issues/2353

Qubes mailing list discussion:
https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/qubes-users/176bd8b8-ade0-3a60-1b12-f168719293a1%40whonix.org

Credits:
This has been a shared project among Qubes and Whonix project.

  • conceptual planning: Patrick Schleizer, Whonix, Marek Marczykowski-G贸recki, Qubes OS, Insurgo
  • command line backend utilities, Whonix integration: Patrick Schleizer, Whonix
  • graphical user interface (GUI), Qubes Remote Support GUI: Marta Marczykowska-G贸recka (Qubes OS)

Gratitude is expressed to NLnet for funding this functionality as part of accessible security project!
